thread.title: NY officials: More than 132,000 listings on job-listing site
thread.title_full: NY officials: More than 132,000 listings on job-listing site - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: NY officials: More than 132,000 listings on job-listing site
text:
ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) - New York officials say there are more than 132,000 job listings on their statewide web site.
Gov. Andrew Cuomo promoted the record-high number of listings on the Jobs Express site as he encouraged private employers and job seekers to use the site.
The Jobs Express site is hosted by the state labor department and sorts jobs by region and occupation, allowing job seekers to narrow down searches.
The web site is at www.labor.ny.gov/jobs/regional.shtm
